extracted_playbook.title: Avoid Clicking Unsolicited Links or Attachments
extracted_playbook.description: Do not click web links or open attachments in unsolicited email messages to protect against social engineering attacks.

extracted_playbook.title: Refer to Email Scam and Social Engineering Resources
extracted_playbook.description: Refer to 'Recognizing and Avoiding Email Scams' and 'Avoiding Social Engineering and Phishing Attacks' for more information on avoiding email scams and social engineering attacks.

extracted_playbook.title: Perform Impact Analysis and Risk Assessment
extracted_playbook.description: Perform proper impact analysis and risk assessment prior to deploying defensive measures.

extracted_playbook.title: Implement ICS Cybersecurity Strategies
extracted_playbook.description: Implement recommended cybersecurity strategies for proactive defense of ICS assets. Refer to CISA's resources on cisa.gov/ics for guidance.

extracted_playbook.title: Report Suspected Malicious Activity
extracted_playbook.description: Follow established internal procedures to report suspected malicious activity to CISA for tracking and correlation against other incidents.
